item.description: Come on out and join us for dinner, drinks & lounge fun on October 16th beginning at 6:30 pm. By popular request, we will enjoy MEZCAL Tequila Cantina which began at this fine restaurant in 2007! Pioneered flavors of the Southwest to Worcester! Oh Yeah! Mexican plates are a hit, warm hospitality & amazing value makes this choice of restaurant a sure pleaser! The website is www.mezcalcantina.com. Specialities are their many varieties of Margaritas' - at your own risk! If you love Mexican food and if you love the company of FUN members and if you're looking for a fabulous night out in October on this Saturday, then sign up today. Space is limited, first 10 people are in and then it will be a waiting list in case anyone cancels. Please keep in mind if you reply with a yes and cannot make it for this event, kindly return back to the calendar and change your reply so that someone from the wait list can go in your spot! MEZCAL has fabulous reviews! See you then for food, drink, conversation and many laughs!
item.name: MEZCAL on Shrewsbury Street - Oh Yeah!
